title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet, resulting in improper display.
EB: I would have expected the behavior where the combo box is always the width of the property sheet column. Note that it should work the same as DialogCellEditor (Button always visible). I will need to investigate to determine if this is an issue with our implementation or with SWT.
SR:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Activate a cell that uses the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe the incorrect sizing of the combo box in relation to the property sheet column width.
